description:
Yuuya is hurrying to help the wounded Kurosaki when Ed appears before him! Ed believes that strength is the true mark of a Duel, and to prove with his own power that Yuuya and Yuushou are wrong about their "entertainment duels," he commences a Duel. Yuuya is shaken by seeing Ed like that, but, wanting to know his true intentions, he shakes off the inhibitors on Yuuto and throws himself into battle...!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 破かれたスマイル・ワールド
